entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 30 before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
